# install libusb-dev

  sudo apt-get install libusb-dev

# install [http://www.intra2net.com%2Fen%2Fdeveloper%2Flibftdi%2Fdownload.php|libftdi]
  
  ./configure && make && sudo make install
  
# install openocd
  
  - [http://developer.berlios.de%2Fprojects%2Fopenocd | download]
  - compile
    ./configure --enable-maintainer-mode  --enable-ft2232_libftdi
    make
    sudo make install
    
# configure openocd

  [[openocd.cfg]]
  
# sudo openocd -f openocd.cfg

  There is a barebox in nand of my board, and it will boot into a command line
  right now.

# telnet localhost 4444

# load zImage to SRAM

{{{
	halt
	load_image zImage 0x30400000
	resume 
}}}

# boot linux in barebox 
  
  - addpart /dev/mem 2M@0x30400000(kernel) 
  - bootz /dev/mem.kernel
